comment: Check out the invaders wearing new shirts with feminist propaganda on them. Its almost as if this is a carefully choreographed push to get women to side with third-world invaders, and to create more controversy when they have to be stopped by force. Whoever is behind this is hoping scores of them will be killed while cameras roll. All in time for the election.
amr:

Its almost as if this is a carefully choreographed push to get women to side with third-world invaders, and to create more controversy when they have to be stopped by force. Whoever is behind this is hoping scores of them will be killed while cameras roll. All in time for the election.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (c / check-out-05

            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (p / person

                              :ARG0-of (h / have-03
                                    :ARG1 (p2 / propaganda
                                          :mod (f / feminism))
                                    :location s)))))
      :snt2 (r / resemble-01
            :ARG1 (ii2 / it)
            :ARG2 (p3 / push-02
                  :ARG1 (a / and
                        :op1 (g / get-04
                              :ARG1 (s2 / side-01

                                    :ARG1 (p4 / person
                                          :ARG0-of (ii3 / invade-01

                                                      :ord (o / ordinal-entity
                                                            :value 3))))))
                        :op2 (c2 / create-01
                              :ARG1 (c3 / controversy
                                    :quant (m2 / more))
                              :time (o2 / obligate-01
                                    :ARG2 (s3 / stop-01
                                          :ARG0 (f2 / force-01)
                                          :ARG1 p4))))
                  :ARG1-of (c4 / choreograph-01
                        :ARG1-of (c5 / care-04)))
            :mod (a2 / almost))
      :snt3 (h2 / hope-01
            :ARG0 (p5 / person
                  :mod (b / behind
                        :op1 (t / this)))
            :ARG1 (k / kill-01
                  :ARG1 (p6 / person
                        :ARG1-of (ii4 / include-91
                              :ARG2 (t2 / they)
                              :ARG3 (m3 / multiple
                                    :op1 20)))
                  :time (r2 / roll-01

            :snt4 (b2 / be-temporally-at-91

comment: Use of the slur here is unacceptable in our discourse as it demeans and insults Mexicans.

comment: You have managed to offend both women and immigrants in one sentence.
